policy_number.description: The unique identifier for the insurance policy.

claim_reference.description: The unique identifier for the claim.

loss_description.description: A brief description of the loss incident.

litigation_status.description: The current status of any litigation related to the claim.

status.description: The current status of the claim.

date_of_loss.description: The date when the loss occurred.

gross_paid.description: The total amount paid for the claim.

adjuster_notes.description: Notes from the adjuster regarding the claim.

reopened_flag.description: Indicates whether the claim has been reopened.

gross_outstanding.description: The total amount still outstanding for the claim.

close_date.description: The provisional date when the claim is expected to close.

reported_date.description: The provisional date when the claim was reported.
